BEVAN George, Three Unpublished Documents from the Thomas Fisher Rare Book Library. Avec résumé en anglais.

1. P. Fay. 155 descr. Loan through a bank. Bacchias, 26 May - 24 June 136. - 2. P. Fay. 307 descr. An application to lease land. Philoteris, 9 July 132. - 3. P. Oxy. III, 637 descr. A declaration of property. Oxyrhynchus, 109-117.
